name: Stellar Orphans
storyline:
"Stellar Orphans" offers an immersive dive into a thrilling intergalactic odyssey. In this deck-building game, every decision shapes the fate of your crew lost in the cosmic expanse. Drifting aimlessly in the darkness of space, your mission is to solve emerging crises to ensure the survival of your "Stellar Orphans."

The game stands out for its strategic aspect, challenging players to build an optimal deck to face cosmic challenges. Forge unexpected alliances, take calculated risks, and wisely use the limited resources at your disposal. Each chosen card impacts the course of the adventure, creating a dynamic and captivating gaming experience.

The game's universe provides narrative depth, blending science fiction elements with tense survival situations. Players face moral dilemmas, heart-wrenching choices, and unexpected twists as they explore the mysterious corners of infinite space.

The central theme of the game, survival in cosmic unknowns, creates an immersive atmosphere. Players feel the weight of decisions, as each crisis resolved or failure suffered influences the trajectory of the story. The game mechanics are designed to encourage adaptability and creativity, offering a rich and renewable experience with each playthrough.

Breathtaking visuals and evocative illustrations transport players to stunning stellar landscapes, reinforcing immersion in this futuristic universe. Meticulous details in the cards and game components contribute to creating a consistent and captivating aesthetic.

"Stellar Orphans" thus offers a comprehensive gaming experience, combining strategy, immersive storytelling, and polished visual components. Whether you are a fan of deck-building games or a science fiction enthusiast, this game promises a unique interstellar journey, where the survival of your crew depends on your choices and ingenuity in the mysterious depths of space. Are you ready to embark on this epic adventure?
